content.name: ‘Better Search UX Through Microcopy’
content.label: Article
content.description: I wrote about how good copy and a little thoughtfulness can improve the all-important search experience.

content.name: Flags in Code
content.label: Side Project
content.description: What’s nerdier, loving vexillology or learning clip-path so you can code the flag of the Republic of Seychelles?

content.name: Mobile Cursor for AfterEffects
content.label: Resource
content.description: I built a template in AE that designers can use to overlay a mobile “cursor” over their prototypes. The effect is fully parametric and powered by a script I modified from one found on StackOverflow.
